BASIC_INFO.TITLE: Basic Information
BASIC_INFO.DESCRIPTION: Fill in the key details that define the mandate's core parameters including client, product, validity period, leasing type, and insurance information.

OFFICERS.TITLE: Officers
OFFICERS.DESCRIPTION: This information will be displayed publicly and should reflect accurate officer records assigned to this mandate.

CONTACT_PERSONS.TITLE: Contact Persons
CONTACT_PERSONS.DESCRIPTION: This information will be displayed publicly and should reflect the correct client contact persons involved in the mandate.

ASSET_TYPE.TITLE: Asset Type
ASSET_TYPE.DESCRIPTION: This information will be displayed publicly and should represent the types of assets relevant to this mandate.

MORE_INFO.TITLE: More Information
MORE_INFO.DESCRIPTION: Provide additional configuration such as grace period settings and other optional mandate details.

MANDATE_ADDITIONAL_TERMS.TITLE: Mandate Additional Terms
MANDATE_ADDITIONAL_TERMS.DESCRIPTION: Specify additional mandate terms and conditions such as regulatory, procedural, or special requirements associated with the leasing mandate.

BASIC.TITLE: Basic Finance Information
BASIC.DESCRIPTION: Enter the essential financial parameters such as lease amount, duration, and type for this mandate.

RATES.TITLE: Rates and Periods
RATES.DESCRIPTION: Configure financial rates, payment intervals, and grace period settings related to the leasing mandate.

CURRENCY.DESCRIPTION: Specify financial settings including currency, exchange rate, interest benchmarks, and payment structure for the leasing mandate.
